channel.title: I almost died 50 different times today
channel.description:
Well apparently half my fucking city is retarded. Heres what happened.
Today I went to get my sisters from school at about 4pm or 16:00. Im leaving the school and it comes up to a road. You can ethier go left or right and there is a stop light. The traffic was pretty congested and apparently people here don't look at stop lights to figure out wether to stop or not, they look at the person in front of them and see if they are continuing through the light or not. Im at the turn where you can ethier go left or right and im going left and waiting at the stop light. The light turns green but guess what traffic is still going on through from left to right. I was in fucking awe as I see the cars keep going through. At first I thought the stop light was broken and all lights were green but guess what, IT WASN'T! I look to the right and the light is red but still fucking mentally handicapped twats continue to go through the light. So I wait and wait. My light turns red and im stuck. This contiunes on for about 4 more red green cycles until some fucking brillant mother fucker figures out that the light is red and he stops. Finally I can fucking go after about 10 minutes of waiting. I dont think ive ever seen anything so fucking stupid in my life. I could babysit 1000 retards and it wouldn't amount to the stupidness I witnessed today. If I would have went when my light was green I would be fucking dead. Yes currently im raging. One good think is that I figured out how fast my vehicle can go from 0 to 80mph. Becuase when they stopped fucking driving. I put that fucking pedal to the ground and took off (road rage). Thoughts? Yes this in America.

item.title: I almost died 50 different times today
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:51, topic:331628”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=428007.msg3226514#msg3226514 date=1275617003]

Hickory, NC. The state which thinks it has the best education system but they are full of shit.

All southern states are shit.

Ahem, I lived in southern states and I drive just fine. Actually, better than most driving instructors where I currently live. Also, I never had to take drivers training or anything, I’ve been driving since i was 13 (currently 18). Didn’t get a license until i was 16, and I passed with one of the highest scores that instructor had ever seen. So bite me.

@TOPIC - This happens everywhere, but I say this. Find another route home, and stop going to that intersection.

weird, most people just score perfect here, guess its just a lot easier here
[/quote]

Well down there, they test your vehicle, your response time (to a point), and how well you do with a large vehicle on a small road.[/quote]
weird, is that for a general license? you’d only have to do that here if it was a specialized license, for truck drivers etc…

Read full topic
item.source: I almost died 50 different times today

item.title: I almost died 50 different times today
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Bebe, post:44, topic:331628”]If the people are running a red light then what makes you think they care about your car? or for that matter are even paying attention enough to see you and have time for them to react. Even then, what if they freeze up and slam into the side of you.

That sounds like a horrible road though. I would contact your local representative and department of transportation and file a complaint. Even if it doesn’t result in change now, it will still be on record that somebody filed a complaint and when they do their annual review of road conditions the accident ratio and complaints will be brought up and you could see results.[/quote]

You wouldn’t believe how many roads in this town are screweded up. Try every 1 out of 3. To fix problems like these they might as well tear every single road up in this area.

Read full topic

If the people are running a red light then what makes you think they care about your car? or for that matter are even paying attention enough to see you and have time for them to react. Even then, what if they freeze up and slam into the side of you.

That sounds like a horrible road though. I would contact your local representative and department of transportation and file a complaint. Even if it doesn’t result in change now, it will still be on record that somebody filed a complaint and when they do their annual review of road conditions the accident ratio and complaints will be brought up and you could see results.

Well considering he never posted anything about that in the original post, I am led to believe he just made it up to make himself look better. Pretty sure they wouldn’t have a light at the top of a hill in a speed limit zone of 50mph.
[/quote]
Sir have you ever visited America? And it’s probably a 35 zone just poorly enforced.[/quote]

Adding the fact that they are already riding bumper to bumper in heavy traffic in a 45 mile speed limit zone already going 5 over me pulling out in front would be like trying to get in front of the side of a train. Causing a mass chain reaction of accidents.

Not to mention the fact people are horrible at measuring distance with their eye. Well people who don’t work with measurements often.

item.title: I almost died 50 different times today
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

Bryanc:

I actually do have a motorcycle. If you’re in a car at a light where you can see the cars going through, then they can obviously see you. As I said they won’t want their car in an accident and will slow down to a stop. Then they will realize their light is red, if they hadn’t already.

There going over a hill at 50 mph and have about 20 feet to stop. Chances are you’re getting hit simply because they couldn’t see you in time.

PS: before you come up with dumb ass responses read the fucking thread.

Read full topic
